attributes.action: Proposal To Have To Pay To Park On Your OWN Road
attributes.additional_details:
Erewash Borough Council are propising to make you buy a parking permit to park on your OWN street due to visitors from the train station parking unwantedly on your street!

I think we should not have to do this because:

- what if you have a party
- we are getting no funding
-we've had no unwanted visitors

rejection.details: This is a matter for Erewash Borough Council.
